code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useRef}from'react';import io from'socket.io-client';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ActiveUsers(_ref){let{username}=_ref;const[activeUsers,setActiveUsers]=useState([]);const socketRef=useRef();useEffect(()=>{socketRef.current=io('http://localhost:3001',{query:{username}});socketRef.current.on('activeUsers',users=>{setActiveUsers(users);});return()=>socketRef.current.disconnect();},[username]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{width:150,border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:10,borderRadius:4,height:'80vh',overflowY:'auto',backgroundColor:'#fff'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Active Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{style:{listStyle:'none',paddingLeft:0},children:activeUsers.map((user,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{style:{marginBottom:6},children:user},user+idx))})]});}
